name: AK'B'AL
description:
We chose to Rewind by taking a step back into Retro gaming history. Tying in classic platformer mechanics into an adventure game! (Unfortunately it is a bit too large a game to fit in the Web GL, but please give it a look, thanks a ton!)

A huge thanks to all of the team!

Artists-

  • Joe Gawlik
  • Nick Huber
  • Jimmy Parello
  • Taylor Santucci

Sound Designer-

  • Will Andrews

Software Developer-

  • Mason Bates

Thanks for jamming with us, can't wait to play everyone else's games!

Check out more at #brackeysgamejame
